print(">>> TYPEOF")
print("Expected output: ")
print("['integer', string', 'array', 'object', 'regex', 'boolean', 'undefined', 'resource', 'proc']")
print("---")

const types = [
  typeof(1),
  typeof(""),
  typeof([]),
  typeof({}),
  typeof(/hi/),
  typeof(true),
  typeof(undefined),
  typeof(:foo),
  typeof(-> () 1)
  ]
  
  print(types)
  
  print(">>>")
